A

ADD_PLAYER - Static variable in class Server
Command to add a player to the game
AM_LEADER - Static variable in class Server
Command client sends to server about whether they are the leader
ASK_TO_DRAW - Static variable in class Server
Command client sends to server when they want to draw cards

C

CANCEL_OPERATION - Static variable in class Server
Command client sends to server when it wants to cancel a decision
CHOOSE_COLOR - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client when they chose to play a wild card, and have to choose a color

D

DRAW_CARDS - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client when they have to draw cards
DREW_CARDS - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client when someone draws cards

E

END_GAME - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client when the game is over
END_UNO_TIME - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client when "uno mode" is exited
ERROR - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client when there is an illegal move or "error"

F

FIRST_CARD - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client about the first card on the discard pile

G

GAME_ALREADY_BEGAN - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client if client wants to play, but game already started
GAME_STARTED - Static variable in class Server
Command client sends to server to start game

I

INIT_PLAYER_HAND - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client about what there initial hand is
INIT_PLAYER_LIST - Static variable in class Server
Command to send the inital list of players to the clients
INVALID_USERNAME - Static variable in class Server
Command to send to client if they have an invalid username
IP_ADDRESS - Static variable in class Server
IP Address of the server

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Server
Main method to start server which begins listening for clients

N

NAME - Static variable in class Server
Command to send and recieve username
NEW_DISCARD_PILE - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client to set a new card as the top of the discard pile for when the deck runs out.

P

PLAY_CARD - Static variable in class Server
Command client sends to server to play a card that was chosen
PLAYER_WON - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client when a player has won
PORT_NUM - Static variable in class Server
Port number of the server

R

REMOVE_PLAYER - Static variable in class Server
Command to remove a player from the game

S

Server - Class in <Unnamed>
A server class that listens for clients to join.
Server() - Constructor for class Server
Starts a new thread to handle a client when it connects to this server socket's port number.
SET_COLOR - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client to tell what "color" the game is on at that moment
SET_LEADER - Static variable in class Server
Command to set the new leader of the lobby
SET_TURN - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client when its time to set a new players turn
SOMEBODY_PLAYED_CARD - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client for when someone has played a card

T

TAKEN_USERNAME - Static variable in class Server
Command to send to client if their username has been taken

U

UNO_TIME - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client when the game is in "uno mode" Client sends this to server when "uno" is said/clicked

W

WON - Static variable in class Server
Command server sends to client that has won
